      • playerMove

        public int playerMove(int amountOfMarbles)
        Allows for human players to enter the desired amount of marbles to be withdrawn from the pile. Does not allow illegal moves of more than half the remaining pile size
        Specified by:
        playerMove in interface Players
        Parameters:
        amountOfMarbles -
        Returns:
        amountTaken the amount of marbles that will be removed from the pile by the human player
